# Security Policy

## Reporting Security Vulnerabilities

If you discover a security vulnerability in this project, please report it by emailing the maintainers or creating a private security advisory through GitHub.

**Please do not report security vulnerabilities through public GitHub issues.**

## Code Scanning

This repository uses Advanced CodeQL setup. See [docs/CODE_SCANNING.md](../docs/CODE_SCANNING.md) for configuration details.

**Security maintainers:** Changes to `.github/workflows/codeql.yml` require approval from @Ritenoob.

## Supported Versions

Security updates are applied to the main branch. Users should always use the latest version from the main branch for the most up-to-date security fixes.

## Security Best Practices

When contributing to this project:
- Never commit API keys, secrets, or credentials
- Review dependencies for known vulnerabilities before adding them
- Follow secure coding practices as outlined in the contributing guidelines
- Ensure all trading operations include proper error handling and validation
